short_summary: Repairs to the M6 Building structural column and wall
description: the request is for structural concrete repair project that includes the following scope of work: concrete beam column and wall remediation in the council's building M-6 of the National Research Council.
full_summary:
# M6 Building Structural Repair

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01025091
* **Solicitation Number**: 22-58136
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-07T14:00:00
* **Category**: Construction of Other Buildings
* **Procurement Category**: **CNST**
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: National Research Council Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R6, Canada

## Procurement Details

This Request for Proposal (RFP) invites eligible contractors to bid on the repair of the structural building M-6 at the National Research Council Canada. The scope of work includes the concrete beam column and wall remediation in the Council’s Building M-6 of the National Research Council.

### Mandatory Requirements

* Contractors must have at least 10 years of experience in structural concrete repair projects.
* Provide two project examples, including approximate value of work and a client reference.
* Provide company profile and relevant history (4 pages maximum).
* Ensure the proposed construction site supervisor and project manager meet the following experience requirements (2 pages maximum):
  * Construction site supervisor: 5 years of relevant experience.
  * Project Manager: 5 years of relevant experience.

### Evaluation Criteria

The Technical Proposal will be evaluated to determine if all mandatory requirements have been met. Proposals not meeting the required criteria will be considered non-compliant and will not be given further consideration.

### Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is required. Contractors must attend one of the scheduled site visits and have their representative sign the Attendance Form.

### Security Requirements

* Contractors must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Director (CISD), Public Works Government Services Canada
* Contractors must comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual
* Contractors must name all their subcontractors and ensure they meet the required security clearance

## Tender Documents

The tender documents include:

* Technical Proposal
* Tender Form
* Security Requirements Checklist
* Industrial Security Manual
* Terms and Conditions
* Proposal Form

Tender packages are available through Buyandsell.gc.ca Achatsetventes.gc.ca. Firms must submit one electronic Technical Proposal and one electronic Tender Form in
